member.name: T:System.Text.DecoderFallbackException
member.summary: The exception that is thrown when a decoder fallback operation fails. This class cannot be inherited.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:System.Text.DecoderFallbackException.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class. A parameter specifies the error message.
member.param: An error message.

member.name: M:System.Text.DecoderFallbackException.#ctor(System.String,System.Byte[],System.Int32)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class. Parameters specify the error message, the array of bytes being decoded, and the index of the byte that cannot be decoded.
member.param: An error message.
The input byte array.
The index position in of the byte that cannot be decoded.

member.name: M:System.Text.DecoderFallbackException.#ctor(System.String,System.Exception)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class. Parameters specify the error message and the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
member.param: An error message.
The exception that caused this exception.

member.name: P:System.Text.DecoderFallbackException.BytesUnknown
member.summary: Gets the input byte sequence that caused the exception.
member.returns: The input byte array that cannot be decoded.

member.name: P:System.Text.DecoderFallbackException.Index
member.summary: Gets the index position in the input byte sequence of the byte that caused the exception.
member.returns: The index position in the input byte array of the byte that cannot be decoded. The index position is zero-based.
